biotools.summary:
A next-generation pipeline to enable the FAIRification of drug screening experiments.

MICHA (Minimal Information for CHemosensitivity Assay) is a protocol for the annotation and reporting of Chemosensensitivity assays by FAIRifying drug sensitivity screening data.

MICHA (Minimal Information for CHemosensitivity Assay) is a web-based platform to facilitate the annotation of major components of common chemosensensitivity (drug sensitivity) assays

bioschemas.name: MICHA
